leg.name: leg
leg.transformationDescription:
The skin around [npc.her] lower body starts to feel numb as it begins to turn dark, While focusing on [npc.her] legs [npc.she] fails to notice [npc.her] feet are shifting. Suddenly [npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] a shifting feeling at [npc.her] feet as the skin around [npc.her] feet starts to soften as [npc.her] toes merge, [npc.her] legs follow suit as sections of skin on your lower waist change hue now being [npc.legFullDescription]
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] soft chitnus, [style.boldYellow(nymph legs and feet)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription].
leg.bodyDescription: [npc.Her] legs are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription(true)], and [npc.her] feet are formed into soft chitnus feron feet, complete with two toes and soft soles.
